reviewDescription: If you have patience you can get a grip onto this. My daughter likes finger knitting so I got this since she wanted to try something new. She had a hard time getting the doll lined up and steady enough to make good stitching. Once she walked away from it for an hour she was able to chill out and and get a grasp of putting this together. She says she’d try another one even though this was difficult for her at first.
reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2024

reviewDescription: It would be great if everyone could sew. The ones who don't know how to sew should get this sewing kit. My grandsons didn't know how to sew, so I got this for them. There's like 8 animals that can be made. My 7 year-old grandson made the lion. He loved sewing the 2 pieces together, and he got really excited when he stopped at the place where he had to put the stuffing in. He stuffed it, and determinedly finished sewing it. He then, placed stickers on the lion in order to make its face, and finally, it was finished. My grandson was so very proud. After that, he made the whale. He loves this sewing kit. It keeps him busy and allows him to learn a new and important skill. Also, it brings out his creativity. I'm totally satisfied.
reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2024

reviewTitle: More than 5 stars if I could!!!
reviewDescription: Ok so this set is absolutely ADORABLE!! It comes with all you need and makes darling little stuffed animals. The felt is already cut and shaped like the animal. Our daughter loves it! She is seven and has done all of them in 3 days. It taught her how to sew. The needles are big and plastic so won’t hurt. You sew the felt, stuff in the fluff, close the animal up and then decorate it with little stickers making the faces and accessories like bows, hats, etc.The stickers are very thick and sticky and don’t come off easily. They are way bigger than I thought. Not tiny little creatures but a cute sized stuffed animal, maybe 5-6 inches tall. Makes 8 different animals. Comes with the fluff, felt, strings, needles, stickers and a well guided manual. Excellent gift for any crafty kid! Highly recommended.
reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2024

reviewTitle: Fun Sewing Set For Little Hand and Fingers
reviewDescription: This is a fun set of pre-cut felt to assemble little plush animals. Adult supervision is recommended if your littles have never sewn before. This set makes it as safe and easy as possible. The pieces are pre-cut and have pre-punched holes for the plastic needles and thread to go through. I gave this set to my 5 year old but her older siblings (8 &10) also enjoyed it very much! This and similar sets have helped spark their interest in sewing!!! It comes with everything including needles, string, stuffing, and the pre printed precut felt decorations. Great set!
reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2024

reviewDescription: The Easy Arts and Crafts for Kids - No Mess Sewing Kit has been a fantastic addition to our craft arsenal, providing hours of creative enjoyment for my children. This kit features 8 easy-to-do animal sewing projects, complete with fun felt stickers, essential tools, and clear instructions. What immediately impressed me was the no-mess aspect of this kit. The pre-cut felt pieces and self-adhesive stickers eliminated the need for messy glue or sharp needles, ensuring a safe and hassle-free crafting experience for young hands. This was a huge relief as a parent, knowing that my children could independently work on their projects without any concerns. The variety of animals included in the kit sparked my children's imaginations. From cute horese to playful whales, each project offered a unique challenge and opportunity to learn basic sewing techniques. The instructions were straightforward and easy to follow, making it accessible even for younger children who are new to sewing. The quality of the materials surpassed my expectations. The felt pieces were vibrant and durable, and the self-adhesive stickers added delightful details to each finished project. The tools provided, such as the plastic needles and thread, were child-friendly and well-suited for small hands.
reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2024

reviewTitle: This was so much fun to do with the girls
reviewDescription: The instructions were very clear; and the stickers for each character came with its own little section that you can easily rip off and focus on, so you can put the others away to save for later to prevent them from getting lost! this was a fun little craft to do with the kids, they loved being able to make their own cute little creation to have and hold!
reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2024

reviewDescription: Me niece is 6 and absolutely loved this kit. Once she got the hang of it half way through the first it was so easy for her! Definitely will be buying these again
reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2024

reviewDescription: I do as many of these Felt animals or “feltimals” as my little Grand calls them now. And this wonderful little kit has become one of my favorites! Now granted I was a wee bit suspicious of how it would turn out when I unboxed it and felt how very thin the felt was! Turns out not really a problem at all! At first I thought I hope there’s another piece of felt inside the box to go with this piece of felt because it was just so thin! So I emptied out the box and sorted thru the felt pieces and matched them all up and then I felt better about how these would turn out! First of all everything is included in this kit from pre-punched holes, floss and needles, stickers, and the softest fluffy stuffing I’ve ever worked with! The needles to Me are a bit too thick but they’re perfect for little ones hands to hold and even thread with or without help just depending on the child’s age I think younger Littles may need some help and older Littles will have no problem with it! I know on some felt sewing that I do I Need all the help I can get trying to thread the tiny needle eye especially if a needle threader is not included! With this kit’s needles I didn’t need any help whatsoever as the eye of the needle is very large and easy to thread! This kit comes with an instruction manual that has pictures that are easy to follow for beginners so they will know just where to start at on the felt and how to leave space to put the fluffy stuffy inside and where all the stickers go onto the feltimal. Once the feltimal is all sewed and stuffed then you will find a square of stickers for that particular animal the picture is in the upper left-hand corner of the square so the correct stickers go on the right feltimal! The stickers punch out easily and I had no problem at all peeling the backs off of them. They do stick pretty well onto the soft felt although be careful not to overstuff the feltimal because that can make the stickers not adhere as well as they should. The one thing I noticed is on the stickers several pieces were stamped unevenly so the little nose may be a bit off and not centered perfectly but really that just adds to the cuteness of the feltimal. You can see an example in my above video. Also the top of the little hat sticker for the polar bear sticks out above the top of its head and the adhesive will pick up dust or anything. I put a piece of the sticker paper over it bit I think I will just put it onto the polar bear’s head a little lower so it’s completely stuck to the felt even if it does look a little wonky! It will still be adorable! For the price I really love this kit and especially the softness of each finished felt animal. I ran a thread thru the top and made these into really cute ornaments that can be used decorating Little’s room or even hang on the Christmas Tree! I have saved a few that I will let my Grand do when she comes to visit as she has learned to sew these feltimals with me and really enjoys it! I would definitely purchase again for the softest little felt animals I’ve ever sewn together and the price is comparable or better than most of the felt kits I’ve used and they come in a very giftable box that would make a great Birthday or Christmas gift for kids and even adults that like to see and make things with their hands! I find sewing these feltimals to be very relaxing and helpful for my anxiety! My mind just tunes everything else out and focuses on creating these adorable little critters! Toodles!
reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2024

reviewDescription: Really easy and straightforward kid craft. The girls and the boys found things that interested them to make. Great kit for a small mixed group looking for some fine motor skill practice.
reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2025

reviewDescription: My 6 year old grand-daugbter LOVED this craft kit. She was a good age for this. Younger ones might struggle a little more and need more hands-on instruction and help. The quality was excellent. It had the best instruction booklet I've seen. Each craft project had its own easy to follow instructions for little one, with pictures showing step by step what was needed. It even showed what color thread to use and what length to cut it. It showed where to start sewing and where to stop to add the stuffing. The package contained 4 sewing needles that were easy to thread. The kit could easily be separated so more than one little one could work on these at the same time. I would highly recommend.
reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2025

reviewTitle: Great activity for my 5 year old
reviewDescription: Great little project for my 5 year old. She absolutely loves this kit! I was surprised that she was able to do most of it own her own after the initial setup. The only downside is the thread can pull right through the holes in the felt at the beginning of the stitch if you’re not careful with your knots, but once I get her started she can usually work on her own for about 30minutes. I think this is a great introduction to get her interested in sewing.

reviewTitle: Awesome little stuffy projects and great for parents and grandparents alike
reviewDescription: If a 100 stars were possible, that’s what I’d rate this kit for kids. My granddaughter loved it. And it’s a terrific way to spend quality time with kids. The finished product is something they can be really proud of and something that can be saved and cherished. And the selection of stuffies in the kit is fabulous. My granddaughter loved every single one. This kit has gotten us started on a project rabbit hole and now that’s our vibe when she comes to my house. It’s our thing now and something she really looks forward to and so do I. So needless to say I HIGHLY recommend this kit to parents and grandparents alike. My granddaughter adored it and she started out age 3, turned 4 during our journey through the kit and had a ton of fun. Definitely 5 stars, wish I could rate it MUCH MUCH higher tho. This would also make a fantastic gift.

reviewDescription: I scooped this up immediately because I couldn't pass up the cute little fox and polar bear. My first instinct was to give it to a family friend whose daughter would probably enjoy making these critters. However, this greedy 60-year-old kept the kit and has had fun making a couple of the little animals. One tip: apply the stickers before adding filling so you don't get any puckering, and don't over fill. I also applied a thin layer of fabric glue to the sticker to make sure it would stay stuck to the felt for a long time. These will make fun little ornaments or package tie-ons. Love it!

reviewDescription: i buy this craft kit for my niece, she is 6 years old and she really enjoy it. here what i think: advantages: materials is safe, non-toxic, so i not worry about her using it. easy to use, instructions is simple, and the pre-cut shapes help lot. lots of cute animals, she like the unicorn most. no mess at all! everything stay clean. disadvantages: the needle is big but sometimes hard for her to push through the felt. some stickers don’t stick well, maybe need more glue? take a bit long to finish one project, so she get tired sometimes. overall, it’s fun and educational but need adult help sometimes. good for patience kids. i think it a nice way to spend time together, and she feel proud when she finish a animal. good choice for quiet playtime.

reviewDescription: This is a very fun and cute concept. It's a pretty unique activity for kids that doesn't involve toys or electronics (always a plus these days!) The kit comes with all the supplies you will need to create the stuffed animals. However, depending on the age of the child, an adult might need to be present to assist with the process. One recommendation I would make is to add a few extra steps in the instructions for beginners. Overall, this was fun and allows a child to spend quite a bit of time completing the activity. I recommend!
reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2024

reviewDescription: This is a great little kit that kept my kids entertained on a rainy day. 3 kids ages 8, 11, and 15 all enjoyed using this set to create the cute little stuffed animals. The minor improvements I'd recommend to the set are including more stuffing, and incorporating the accessories into the sewing. The accessories are just stickers that are simply slapped on and can easily come off. It would be great if these were made so they could be sewn onto the animal as well since this would make the final product longer-lasting and would significantly increase the time spent creating these. My kids were very happy and the final products were nice and bright so all around we are happy with this set.
reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2024

reviewTitle: Fun and pretty relaxing screen-free activity
reviewDescription: These no mess sewing kits end up keeping the little ones occupied for a good while and they are usually pretty ecstatic once they are all done. The felt is soft and the end figures are really cute. While there's not a lot of room for creativity or individuality in the overall shape of the figures, there is a good amount in the placement of the stickers and features if you want, or you can use the easy to follow instructions. The jumbo needle has a blunt tip and there's not really a risk of poking a finger. Just watch out the kids don't go flailing their arms around and are aware of their surroundings.

reviewDescription: This is going to be perfect for my niece for a gift. She will absolutely love it.

reviewDescription: This is a nice little beginning sewing/fine motor skills kit. The felt pieces are easy to hold and use and the holes were a good size for poking the plastic needles through. The distance around each of the designs is good - it seems like a real project, but it's not overwhelming for a little kid. The stick-on felt details hold nicely and are a cute finishing touch. It makes for a very nice finished product, that the kids were proud of! My two kids are 6 and 8 and don't have much experience with a needle and thread yet, so I had to help with tying knots and getting the thread untangled occasionally. I think if they try some more, they will become more independent with it, though... and I think that is the point. :)

reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on April 28, 2025

reviewDescription: This is a great kit with 8 projects. It is worth the money. The only problem I can see is the age suggestion. My granddaughter was 2 weeks shy of her 5th birthday. There is no way she could do this by herself. Maybe a craftier child could. She had so much difficulty sewing the animal together before stuffing it to the point that I took over and finished it for her. After stuffing and closing the animal, she was able to put on the face and decorations herself. I think a 6 year old might be able to do the sewing herself, but I have doubts about a 5 year old. Perhaps, if you are very patient and are willing to undo sewing mistakes and teach the sewing method, you could teach a 5 year old how to sew the animal together and not have to take it over. In any case with 8 animal projects and plenty of thread, it is a great kit. The holes in the needles are large enough for a child to thread them. The holes in the animal patterns are large and easy to line up. I recommend this kit.

reviewDescription: My 6 almost 7 year old daughter loves this kit! She needs a little help making sure everything is lined up, but can do a lot of it on her own. The little animals are cute and the stickers stay on them very well!

reviewDescription: This craft kit has great potential but it was missing several pieces so we couldn't make two (which is a quarter) of the projects. I got it to do with my 5-year-old granddaughter. First she wanted to do the unicorn -- but it was missing the front and the back felt pieces so we couldn't make it. Then she chose the pink rabbit -- missing the front piece. At this point we were both getting frustrated. She ended up making the rabbit and it turned out nicely. Later she came back and asked if we could do another one and she made the whale. Positives -- they're cute and it helps children learn to manipulate a plastic needle. Negatives -- missing parts, the stick-on embellishments aren't super sticky so they will come off with only a little bit of playing with, and it says that it's for ages 4+. My granddaughter is 5 and there is no way she could have made this without me sitting with her and helping the entire way. Only buy this if an adult is going to make it with the child. And with so many major pieces missing, I wouldn't buy it at all.
reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2024

reviewDescription: So easy and my daughter loves it

reviewTitle: Super fun, high quality felt kit
reviewDescription: This sewing kit was purchased for my 89 year old mother. She has stitched so many kids felt stitch kits over the last 2 years. I must say, this is one of her favorites by far! The felt is very soft and easy to work with, the stick-on’s are of high quality. Overall these are the cutest animals ever! We add plastic lobster clips to them for backpacks and donate them to schools.

reviewTitle: Adorable and perfect for little kids
reviewDescription: I've got 7 year old twins that have been begging to do sewing projects. This was the perfect kit for them. The little stuffies are absolutely adorable and the kit has everything you need. It's super easy to use for my littles and helps with their fine motor skills. They are so proud of their creations and really had a great time making them. Would definitely recommend!

reviewDescription: The pre made holes helped my child followed the line around the pattern with the plastic needle. She was frustrated the first time. But once she got the hang of it she felt proud of finishing her stuff animal and wanted to do it again.

reviewDescription: Great variety of animals. Used this as an activity at a 4 year old birthday part. The children definitely needed parent help, but the sewing was pretty easy due to the pre-punched holes. Nice value for the money and fun craft!
reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2024

reviewTitle: Great for both my 5 & 8 year old
reviewDescription: My younger son has been asking for a kit to learn how to sew for awhile and this is a perfect beginner kit for a kid. It has everything they need to make cute animal stuffies. There is felt cut out in the shape that already has holes for the large needle and thread that is used. To finish the animals, there are felt stickers which make it easy to add those elements if needed and allows room for creativity as well. There are many different animals that can be made, both my sons have made a few. They gave some away to cousins and their cousins LOVED them. Overall I think this is a great kit for kids interested in learning the basics of sewing.
reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2024

reviewDescription: Gave this to my daughter for her birthday and she has had a blast creating little creatures. Definitely recommend to anyone who has a child who loves creative.
